abstract: While the majority of the proceeds from SeaWorld’s successful I.P.O. go to the Blackstone Group, SeaWorld is using its share of the money to reduce its debt, and, in general, to help it achieve its corporate goals.
snippet: While the majority of the proceeds from SeaWorld’s successful I.P.O. go to the Blackstone Group, SeaWorld is using its share of the money to reduce its debt, and, in general, to help it achieve its corporate goals.
lead_paragraph: 4:30 p.m. | Updated James D. Atchison was a lowly parking lot attendant when he started working at Busch Gardens in Tampa, Fla., nearly three decades ago. Today, he is the chief executive and president of the theme park’s operator, SeaWorld Entertainment, which is now a publicly traded company.

headline.main: SeaWorld C.E.O. Hints at Overseas Ambitions
